The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

wikitext.*:
'''Hope''' can refer to several concepts or people:

==Middle-earth==
*''[[Estel]]'', the [[Sindarin]] word for "hope", a name of [[Aragorn]] and a philosophical concept.
*''[[Amdir (Sindarin word)|Amdir]]'', a [[Sindarin]] word for "hope", but another concept.
*The [[Old Hope]], a belief among some [[Men]] after their Fall.
*''[[Harthad]]'', a [[Noldorin]] term for "hope".

==Adaptations==
*''[[Hope and Memory]]'', a scene in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
**''[[Hope and Memory (Soundtrack)]]'', the accompanying music track.
*''[[Hope Fails]]'', a scene in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
**''[[Hope Fails (Soundtrack)]]'', the accompanying music track.
*"The Hidden Hope",  the seventh book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]''.
*''[[Born of Hope]]'', a fan film.
